author: serra
title: Roundtrip Flight: San Francisco, LA, or NYC to Manila, Philippines $498 (Travel Sept - Nov)
text: Original Post Edited Today at 12:04 PM by jersharocks Philippines Airlines have roundtrip airfares travelling from Los Angeles or San Francisco to Manila for $498, nonstop. Or travel from New York City, with 1 stop in Vancouver Canada, also for $498. SFO or LAX-MNL $498 RT Nonstop Departs Sun-Thurs from Sept 3 thru Nov 23 Returns wide availability JFK - MNL $498 RT - 1 stop in Vancouver Canada Departs JFK: Sept 19, 26; Oct 3, 17, 24, 31; Nov 7, 14, 21 Returns JFK: wide availability Mon, Tues, Thurs, Sat Use those dates and book it on Expedia [ expedia.com ] . You may also use other travel sites like Orbitz, Priceline, CheapOAir but Expedia is $2 cheaper. Samples attached for all three departure cities.
